Articles.Content: I'm definitely not a citrus fruit of any kind, especially not an orange. Anyone who accuses me of such will be sent to [REDACTED]. I hope to really enjoy myself on this forum.

Hello NotAnOrange, and welcome to the forums!

To the best of my knowledge, no members of this community are citrus fruit of any kind.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the madhouse NotAnOrange ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Seriously though, we're a fun and friendly bunch. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hello!

Glad to see you are not a lemon. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

We are more like green... olives. Some of us appear to like some booze too ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif), but shhh... we call it... *Hydrazine... shhh*
You'll fit right in. Been to Eve yet? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Nope. Still can't even get to the Mun without either a truckload of D/V or MechJeb.
I'm totally not a grapefruit or anything, what are you guys talking about? I've been compromised, repeat, I've been compromised!

> 
> Nope. Still can't even get to the Mun without either a truckload of D/V or MechJeb.

Did someone order a truckload of delta V?

![3AK8dg7.png](http://i.imgur.com/3AK8dg7.png)

> 
> Did someone order a truckload of delta V?
> [http://i.imgur.com/3AK8dg7.png](http://i.imgur.com/3AK8dg7.png)

What mod is the bottom bit with the "Vessel" and "Resources" info from?

That's from Kerbal Engineer.

Happy landings!
